# Question 4

```{r}
N = 100000
n = 25
pi = 0.06
count = 0
for(i in 1:N){
  z = rbinom(n,1,pi)
  y = sum(z)
  pi_hat = y/n
  
  l = pi_hat - 1.96*sqrt(pi_hat*(1-pi_hat)/n)
  t = pi_hat + 1.96*sqrt(pi_hat*(1-pi_hat)/n)
  
  if(l<= pi & pi <= t){
    count = count + 1
  }
}

count/N

```
